quote: Don't wish for it...Work for it!
author: Unknown

quote: Its kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If you obey all the rules you miss all the fun.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The journey is the fun part.
author: Jaime Tardy

quote: Life is short, smile when you still have teeth. :)
author: Mallory Hopkins

quote: If you tickle me I'm not responsible of your injuries.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing worth having comes easy.
author: Unknown

quote: Good work ain't cheap, cheap work ain't good.
author: Sailor Jerry

quote: The bigger your challenges the bigger your opportunity for growth.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Don't limit your challanges. Callenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you.
author: Unknown

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Winners are not those who never fail but those who never quit.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Surround yourself with those on the same mission as you.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up, dress up, show up and never give up.
author: Genevieve Rhode

quote: Today's forecast: 100% chance of winning.
author: Unknown

quote: Take chances when you're young so that you can tell stories when you are old.
author: Unknown

quote: Teamwork makes the dream work.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Never be so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.
author: Unknown

quote: If you can't find a way, make one.
author: Unknown

quote: Feel the fear and do it anyway.
author: Susan Jeffers

quote: Big dreams have small beginnings.
author: Unknown

quote: The climb is tough, but the view from the top is worth it.
author: Unknown

quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine, its' lethal.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is too short to be anything but happy.
author: Unknown

quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.
author: Unknown

quote: Once in a while blow your own damn mind.
author: Unknown

quote: A little rebellion now and then is a good thing.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Save the earth, its the only planet with chocolate.
author: Unknown

quote: Kindness is like sugar, it makes life taste a little sweeter.
author: Carla Yerovi

quote: Living on earth is expensive, but it includes a free trip around the sun every year.
author: Unknown

quote: I tried to be normal once - worst two minutes of my life.
author: Unknown

quote: Focus. You can do this.
author: Unknown

quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Time is more value than money. You can more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Start by doing what is necessary then do what is possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Saint Francis of Assisi

quote: Believe it to achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.
author: Christopher Rice

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When life put you in tough situation, don't say 'Why me?' just say 'Try me!'.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

quote: In life, it's not where you go. It's who you travel with.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: A good friend is like a computer: she enters your life, saves you in her heart, formats your problems, shifts you to opportunity and never deletes you from her memory.
author: Unknown

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Dare to believe something amazing is going to happen in your life. When you believe, all things are possible.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: We have a strategic plan. It's called doing things.
author: Herb Kelleher

quote: Amazing things are going to happen...
author: Unknown

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Your ideas are like diamonds...without the refining process, they are just a dirty rock, but by cutting away the impurities, they become priceless.
author: Paul Kearly

quote: Motivation is like food for the brain. You cannot get enough in one sitting. It needs continual and regular top ups.
author: Peter Davies

quote: Never stop learning. If you learn one new thing Table1 you will overcome 99% of your competition.
author: Joe Carlozo

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
author: Confucius

quote: Handle your business without people knowing your business.
author: Unknown

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: John Lennon

quote: You are not going to get the butt you want by sitting on it.
author: Unknown

quote: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The secret of humor is surprise.
author: Aristotle

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is to not stop questioning.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don't wish for it...Work for it!
author: Unknown

quote: Think BIG! You are going to be thinking anyway, so think BIG!
author: Donald Trump

quote: Surround yourself with people who make you happy. People who make you laugh, who help you when you’re in need. People who genuinely care. They are the ones worth keeping in your life. Everyone else is just passing through.
author: Torin Rush

quote: Each and every one of us is a leader. Some of us just don't know it yet.
author: Umair Haque

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn ́t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life begins where fear ends.
author: Osho

quote: A penguin cannot become a giraffe, so just be the best penguin you can be.
author: Gary Vaynerchu

quote: coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It's not going to be easy but it's going to be worth it.
author: Ewshy

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ben Sweetland

quote: Don't count the days - make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right then once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: Nothing ever gets easier - you just get better.
author: Unknown

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Be the change you want to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: Never laugh at live dragons.
author: J.R.R Tolkien

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Did you know that, if you visualise, you can actually hug on the phone?
author: Shelley Long

quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow, so just do it!
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: Some people dream of success, while you're gonna wake up and work hard at it.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Emelia Earhart

quote: I trained 17 years and 114 days to be an overnight success.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Time only has value when it intersects with energy.
author: Jim Loehr

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration
author: Thomas Edison

quote: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Please think about your legacy, because you're writing it every day.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We only get to play this game one time...one life.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napolean Hill

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: No matter how good you get you can always get better, and that's the exciting part.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: You can't always control the wind, but you can control your sails.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Concentrate on a single goal, a single task, and beat it into submission.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Be a motivator. Visualize positive results. Be enthusiastic and share your visions.
author: Bruce Tuglan

quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Get up, stand up, Stand up for your rights. Get up, stand up, Don't give up the fight.
author: Bob Marley

quote: When pain brings you down, don't be silly, don't close your eyes and cry, you just might be in the best position to see the sun shine.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.
author: Selena Gómez

quote: There must be some kind of way out of here,' said the joker to the thief...
author: Bob Dylan
